actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to deposit civil penalties and assessments collected for false claims and statements made with respect to public housing to a Fraud Compensation Fund at the Department of Housing and Urban Development.
short_title: Fairness for Housing Communities Act of 2019
subjects: Department of Housing and Urban Development

summary.text:
Fairness for Housing Communities Act of 2019

This bill requires that the amount of any penalty or assessment imposed by the Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) because of a false claim made in connection with certain public housing assistance be returned to HUD. 

HUD may establish a Fraud Compensation Fund consisting of such amounts.

titles.title: Fairness for Housing Communities Act of 2019
Fairness for Housing Communities Act of 2019

A bill to deposit civil penalties and assessments collected for false claims and statements made with respect to public housing to a Fraud Compensation Fund at the Department of Housing and Urban Development.
